definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3
containing_words.word: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游擊手將永遠不會忘記的再實踐。

sentences.english: In our consulting practice, we reverse the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的諮詢實踐中，我們改變了程序。

sentences.english: Chapter three explores how to lead the primary school language teaching into the local culture of study in primary schools.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探究了小學語文教學引入如東地方文化的實踐。

sentences.english: And we scheduled it and we get it and my dad and my sister would help trim it.
sentences.chinese: 先做安排然後實踐，爸爸和姐姐會幫忙修剪聖誕樹。

sentences.english: Now, in practice, it depends on how good your measurement is.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，它取決於你的測量方法有多高明。

sentences.english: This best practice should still be followed.
sentences.chinese: 這個可靠實踐方法仍然需要遵循。

sentences.english: But how can I apply to practice?
sentences.chinese: 但是我如何才能運用於實踐呢？

sentences.english: One must learn by doing in stages, and advancing those things that work.
sentences.chinese: 人們必須在實踐中學習，再進一步讓過程工作的更好。

sentences.english: However, this is very difficult to apply in practice on actual projects.
sentences.chinese: 但是在實際的項目中，這是非常難於付諸實踐的。

sentences.english: Contract after rent in the countryside la nd circulation practice blooming.
sentences.chinese: 反租倒包在農村土地流轉的實踐中脫穎而出。

sentences.english: And through prayer, God helps me put into practice what I learn.
sentences.chinese: 藉着禱告，上帝幫助我把所明白的東西付諸實踐。

sentences.english: The advanced beginner uses best practices.
If the conclusions can not be applied in practice, better dump them when it is still early.
sentences.chinese: 如果得出結論不能在實踐中應用，趁早扔了。

sentences.english: Astrology is a trusted science and is being practiced for over 4000 years," said an affidavit filed by Dr R Ramakrishna, deputy drug controller (India), west zone.
sentences.chinese: 占星術是被信服的科學，已被實踐了4000多年。

sentences.english: In practice, residual values are ignored if they are not expected to be material in amount.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，如果殘值金額預計不大，通常被忽略。

sentences.english: The practice makes sure voice electronic mail system model based on 4-tiered architecture is viable and effective.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證實了該模型的可行性和有效性。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
